reasoning: Autoimmune platelet disorder with incidence estimated at 1.6-3.9 per 100k from multiple cohort studies. Global average approximately 2.4 per 100k based on Western registry data; limited data from other regions.
source: Rodeghiero F et al. (2009). Standardization of terminology, definitions and outcome criteria in immune thrombocytopenic purpura of adults and children. Blood. 113(11):2386-2393
